title: David Andrews credits Drake Maye as one of reasons why he wanted to keep playing
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "Now these pass-catchers are seeing what Drake's doing, and you're going to see the Tom Brady type of effect.

title: 2 women arraigned on animal cruelty charges after dogs die in hot car
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime The women pleaded not guilty to all charges.
Two Bridgewater women pleaded not guilty Wednesday to charges in relation to their dogs dying in a hot car.
Lisa Smith, 59, and Rachel Smith, 33, were each charged with cruelty to an animal and confining an animal in a motor vehicle in extreme heat or cold, according to court documents.

title: Haverhill police chief put on leave amid multiple tragedies and outrage from families of officers
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Chief Robert Pistone's department faced scrutiny after a man died in an interaction with officers in July.
The recent death of a Haverhill officer supercharged tensions.
Haverhill Police Chief Robert Pistone has been placed on leave, according to multiple reports.

title: Patriots’ Drake Maye, Will Campbell dine out together in Boston’s North End
author: John Waller
bullets: New England Patriots Perhaps a celebratory meal after New England's big win in Buffalo.

By John Waller October 9, 2025 | 11:33 AM 1 minute to read After their primetime upset win in Buffalo, young Patriots stars Drake Maye and Will Campbell took to Boston’s North End on Monday night, where they had dinner together at the Italian restaurant Tony & Elaine’s.
Patriots quarterback Drake Maye; Tony Frattaroli, one of the namesakes of Tony & Elaine’s; and Patriots rookie left tackle Will Campbell.
